channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP-EMail
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP-EMail

item.title: CVE-2023-3721|2024-08-02T07:01:57.458Z -- unknown -- wp-email
item.description: The WP-EMail WordPress plugin before 2.69.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
